subject: Football
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: Seattle’s hopes of containing the league’s best offense hinge on its ability to mount long drives, and its N.F.L.-leading defense’s success in hurrying Peyton Manning and jamming Bronco receivers.
snippet: Seattle’s hopes of containing the league’s best offense hinge on its ability to mount long drives, and its N.F.L.-leading defense’s success in hurrying Peyton Manning and jamming Bronco receivers.
